channel.title: Veikka Leppänen | CNIR Group - Dogu Baran Aydogan

item.title: Veikka Leppänen
item.description: Veikka Leppänen is currently pursuing a Master’s degree and working as a research assistant in the CNIR group at the A.I. Virtanen Institute for Molecular Sciences, University of Eastern Finland in Kuopio, Finland. With a growing interest in neuroimaging, he is dedicated to learning and contributing to the field, particularly through the development of diffusion MRI-based microstructure analysis methods. This project represents an exciting challenge and an opportunity to deepen his understanding of brain imaging techniques.
